Hi guys, can you help me with 1 ting ?!

I have downloaded all of PB episodes but all of them have been 1 txt file and 1 exe file on about 350 mb, but this one is a lot of files like 14 mb eatch !? How do i play this as 1 hole episode ? I Have also tryd to download some movies and got the same problem not getting to play the hole movie in once since its so many files ?! Somone can help ?

Why on earth would you pack the avi in a multiple volume RAR file?! As soon as anyone downloads it, they decompress it and delete the files, cause they're not needed anymore!
And it makes the torrent crap, because it makes a lot less people seed it.

JaCkPoT_:
You have to unrar the files with winrar or similar.
Right click on the first file (prison.break.204.hdtv-lol.r01) and click Open with... > winrar. Extract and out comes and .avi file :)
Hey Elsebasbe, Thank you. but whats the point of doing it this way ? easier to just do it the regular way and upload 1 file ?!

JaCkPoT_
Because this is the original release, the one the scene group (LOL in this case) made.

If you want another one, maybe an unpacked or on another way touched release you can download that instead.
